LIF > overview

Overview of LIF

Version 1, October 2014

This document contains a general overview of the LAPPS Interchange Format (LIF), which is a JSON-LD format used to tranport data between LAPPS services. This version of the document is just a draft with a couple of disjointed notes.

The current JSON schema for LIF are at

http://vocab.lappsgrid.org/schema/lif-schema.json

At this point it is dangerous to assume that the schema are in sync with the prose in these LIF pages.

The rest of this document now has some current open issues

Use of identifiers in LIF.
